group_1.textRight: *Pant*...*Pant*...
Even with lights, you still need to watch your@step here, huh...

group_1.textLeft: This is an animal trail that only locals would@think to enter.
Asahi's signal is toward the innermost end.

group_1.textRight: How cruel to harm someone in a place where@no one can see...
[chara:802401:effect_shake]Woah!
Sorry, Rabi. You saved me.

group_1.textLeft: ...With the moon so bright tonight, it might be@better to turn off the lights.
I have good night vision, so I can see relatively well.

group_1.textRight: Can't say the same for an old man with aging eyes...
[chara:802401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―?!

group_1.textLeft: Gunshot...
[flashEffect:flashRed2][chara:103400:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:3043A04]GaaAAGH!

group_1.textRight: Heh... Haha ha...

group_1.textLeft: Ugh......*Pant*...*Pant*...

group_1.textRight: Seems like even old hunting rifles work well@enough with just a little maintenance.
C'mon, that should be enough to get your ass@out of town, right?

group_1.textLeft: Unfortunately...not...

group_1.textRight: Aim for the legs next time.

group_1.textLeft: Stop it. Any more and people will notice.

group_1.textRight: Aren't you being overly kind just because she's@one of your classmates?

group_1.textLeft: While there are other ways to corner her, we@don't want her to get used to the pain right now.
...This is absolutely absurd.@Without a doubt, clearly a serious crime...

group_1.textRight: ...You're responsible for more than just the@deaths in the avalanche and at the Festival...
You've been taking lives long before we even@knew who you truly were...
I can't believe such despicable people would@say those words.
Oh, you're saying you don't wanna become a Witch,@and Magical Girls protect people from Witches?
The others are all doin' their best, and the only@ones at fault are you guys?
No matter what face you put on or what you say,@we've been fooled for years.

group_1.textLeft: Kuroda...@Have you truly lost your mind...?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... All thanks to YOU!
Urgh...that was fierce...

group_1.textLeft: Your shoulder is bleeding!

group_1.textRight: It's okay... I was simply grazed.@I'll be fine as long as I visit a hospital later.

group_1.textLeft: Charging in recklessly like that...!
Uh-oh, we've been found...!
I remember this guy...@He spoke on stage at the Festival...

group_1.textRight: You've misunderstood what Magical Girls are like.

group_1.textLeft: What did you say...?

group_1.textRight: It's exactly as Rabi-chan described during that@Nightlife Homeroom.
Magical Girls don't become Witches because@they want to...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: Each and every one of them is a young person@with hopes and worries just like yours.
In order to alleviate the suffering they cannot@manage on their own,
they make a contract with Kyubey without@knowing the details of being a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: So what are you tryin' to say?

group_1.textRight: In other words, the majority of Magical Girls are@unaware of their fate to become Witches.
No Magical Girl is born to spread curses...

group_1.textLeft: Are you telling us to just accept that?

group_1.textRight: Given how far things have gone, it's unlikely you@can back down now. I'm sure it's difficult to accept.
Still, I want you to admit you've misunderstood...!
And I want you to truly comprehend what@Magical Girls are...!
They tried to escape their suffering, only to@end up risking their lives in battle against Witches.
Moreover, they're confronted with the fact that@their destiny is to become Witches themselves.
And yet, despite the unimaginable grief it entails...
They're also tormented by the very people who@used to be their friends!
Nevertheless, they persist in opening their arms@wide, ready to embrace the torrent of anguish
and fury unleashed by the loss of your loved ones...!
You are being saved by the pure souls of innocent@Magical Girls!
So please, just let them go...
I don't give a damn about your boring rambling.@Sure you've seen us, what're you gonna do about it?
If we dig down deep enough, I doubt the dogs'll@be able to find you.

group_1.textLeft: That's something we—

group_1.textRight: If you try to cause harm, I'll neutralize you with@my music, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Sasha!

group_1.textRight: Looks like my timing was just right.

group_1.textLeft: ...Whether or not I'll change my mind, that is@another story.
For now, we're done here for today.@The mood's been spoiled.

group_1.textRight: ...*Sigh*.
